author: -Rosa Luxemburg
quote: Freedom is always exclusively freedom for the one who thinks differently

author: -Jean-Jacques Rousseau
quote: Man was born free and he is everywhere in chains.

author: -Oscar Wilde
quote: Work is the curse of the drinking class

author: -Richard Stallman
quote: Using vi is not a sin; it is a penance.

author: -Rumi
quote: Raise your words, not voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.

author: -Kurt Vonnegut
quote: Everything was beautiful, and nothing hurt.

author: -Georg Hegel
quote: The learner always begins by finding fault, but the scholar sees the positive merit in everything.

author: -Georg Hegel
quote: We learn from history that we do not learn from history.

author: -Leo Tolstoy
quote: All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.

author: -Leo Tolstoy
quote: In the name of God, stop a moment, cease your work, look around you.

author: -Arundhati Roy
quote: Another world is not only possible, she is on her way. On a quiet day, I can hear her breathing.

author: -Thomas Sankara
quote: The spirit is smothored, as it were, by ignorance, but so soon as ignorance is destroyed, spirit shine forth, like the sun when released from clouds.

author: -Thomas Paine
quote: The world is my country, all mankind my brethren, and to do good is my religion.

author: -Simon Bolivar
quote: Judgement comes from experience. And experience comes from bad judgement.

author: -Brihaspati
quote:
The costly rites enjoined for those who die
Are but a means of livelihood devised
By sacerdotal cunning, nothing more...
While life endures let life be spent in ease
And merriment; let a man borrow money
From all his friends, and feast on melted butter

author: -Oliver Cromwell
quote: He who stops being better stops being good.

author: -Chen Duxiu
quote: Our  task  today  can  be  said  to  be  the  intense  combat  between  the  old  and  the  modern modes of thought.

author: -Steven Wright
quote: On the other hand... you have different fingers.

author: -Sergei Eisenstein
quote: Language is much closer to film than painting is.

author: -Mikhail Bulgakov
quote: What would your good do if evil didn't exist, and what would the earth look like if all the shadows disappeared?

author: Leon Trotsky
quote: Life is beautiful. Let future generations cleanse it of all evil and enjoy it to the fullest.
